name: iolite
description: A minimal Electron application written with Typescript

scripts.pack: npm run build && npx electron-packager . --out build/
scripts.pack:mac: npm run build && npx electron-packager . --out build/ --platform=darwin
scripts.pack:linux: npm run build && npx electron-packager . --out build/ --platform=linux
scripts.pack:win: npm run build && npx electron-packager . --out build/ --platform=win32
